channel.title: Icons on Balance
channel.description: Recent content in Icons on Balance

item.title: Icons
item.description: Additionally, custom icons are also fully supported. Simply provide your own SVG icon assets by placing them in the assets/icons/ directory in the root of your project. Any icons in the icons directory will then be available to use throughout the theme. In order achieve automatic color filling every SVG path needs fill=“currentColor” XML attribute.
